attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we want freedom.not dictators.you make enought out the tax on cigarettes.and fuel.
you can smoke in your houses of parliment.but we are like lepers.standing outsite.our brave soldiers of ww1.ww2.and iraq and afganistan have and are fighting for freedom.but it looks like we will have to fight for freedom against fuel prices.right to smoke.listen to the people.before it's too late.we know the media is being hushed up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
